questions: Mention any one development as goal of land less rural labourers.  		What is the development goal of rural people of India as per your viewpoint ?
answers: Ans.		Any one development goals of landless rural labourers can be :  Regular income.  Regular job.  Small piece of land.  Equal status in society.  1

questions: In what respect is the criterion used by the UNDP for measuring development of the countries, different from the one used by the World Bank?
answers: UNDP compares countries on educational level, health status and per capita income whereas. World Bank uses only per capita per capita income for measuring development.  1

questions: If there are 4 families in a country with per capita income of $ 15000. The income of 3 families is $ 10000, $ 20000, and $ 12000. What is the income of the 4th family ?
What is the advantage of per capita income ? Mention any one.
answers: It is the most appropriate criterion of measuring the development of any country.

questions: How is the average income of a country calculated ?
answers: Dividing the total income of the country by its total population.

questions: According to the World Bank , which country would be classified as a low income country ?
answers: Any country with percapita income of US $ 1035 or less .

questions: What is the most common indicator for measuring economic development of a country ?  Or 		Which is a useful measure for comparison between countries ? Or 		Which factor determines the development of a country ? Or Which income is also called average income ?
Into how many categories the World Bank has classified the countries ?
Which area of the world has the largest crude oil reserves ?
Which countries are called rich countries ?
answers: Countries with per capita income of US $ 12616 and above.
